name: Rise Of Three Kingdoms
description:
Rise Of Three Kingdoms is a Three Kingdoms history simulation strategy game. To make the product more realistic, we have browsed Records of the Three Kingdoms, Book of Later Han, ZiZhiTongJian and The spring and Autumn period of Emperor Xian. We also sort out material with eight hundred thousand words as the reference resources for the game design. During the period of study the details of Three Kingdoms, we have found many interesting facts. For example, Liubei was actually a man with nor beard; Jianggan, who stole the books was a handsome guy; the mother of Zhanglu had secret relationship with Liuzhang's father, who was the enemy of the former one... As we designed the game, we tried to put as much details as possible into the game and provide you a more realistic Three Kingdoms world.
As a lord of a certain territory, you will appoint your interior officers to search and visit the celebrities and input them to the generals list of Three Kingdoms. You can use different arrays and the advantages of the terrain against enemies with more soldiers than you. Military and strategical movement will be launched on the map. Welcome to prosper the Han Dynasty!


The game is in the stage of preemptive experience, and we will continually fix bugs and optimize the details. We will also add up many new contents and game plays, which will be updated on Steam. If you have any problem during the period of your playing, or if you have any suggestion and opinion, please tell us . We will provide you with better game experience and fun!



game features
More than 600 generals will appear and all the character design is restored accroding to the Three Kingdom history. The real Three Kingdoms culture will be magnified. (for instance:)





More than 400 generals and their historical stories are waiting for your exploration. This is a game as well as a book.





Political and military strategical game which is easy for beginners to play.






This is for the fans of strategical game, with its generals collocation, the array, terrain and attack postion of the battlefield.





Stick to the kingcraft or carry out the way of overlord? You can choose from different monarchs to have various experience.


Rise Of Three Kingdoms is for the players below:
Who like playing Three Kingdoms series games
Who like simulation or strategical game
Who are interested in history especially the history of Three Kingdoms period
Who have independent thinking habit in strategical battle
Who collect and cultivate Three Kingdoms characters
Who like develop the cities of his own.
